content.rendered:
Meat Free Lanieres De Poulet

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 box Fry’s Chicken-Style Strips
1 packet braai charcoal
Mint and thyme
2 tbsp margarine
1 tsp Robertson’s Spice for Rice
1 cup mushroom, chopped
½ cup mild or hot peri-peri sauce
1 tbsp olive oil
1 onion, chopped
Pinch black pepper
Rice
Mixed vegetables

Directions

Mix strips with mint and thyme. Wrap in foil and put on hot coals for 5 Minutes.

Melt margarine in a pan. Cook onions and mushroom. Add ½ a cup of peri-peri sauce and simmer for 1 Minute.

Add a pinch of pepper. Cook rice, flavour with Spice for Rice. Braise vegetables in a scoop of margarine.
